item.title: Setting up failover ospf routing on Fortigate
item.description: Iâ€™ve put together a small guide for setting up two Fortigates with failover ospf routing. This example is based on a small lab, but you can easily adapt it to your own environment. This is the scenario: In this scenario we want the 100Mb line to be prioritized. Start of with setting up the two Fortigates with ip-adresses as shown. Also make sure to create firewall rules for traffic from internal to wan1 and wan2 and back (make sure not to enabel NAT).
